LanguageData.GR_AgePills.label: пилюли растишки
LanguageData.GR_AgePills.description:
These capsules are filled with a mixture of chemicals and nanomachines, able to modify an organism's age by carefully manipulating its DNA. Every pill taken increases age by 1 year. Useful for animals to make them mature quickly.

Once consumed, the animal will be extremely dizzy for at least a day, and additional pills administered during that period won't be effective.

Oh, your colonists can also consume them...
